::Shredder::

Shredder frowns. "I guess I can. I'll be able to find out more info by
scouting around. Alot of bots don't know I've joined the Destrons, and
if I have some connections, I can get more out of them if they don't
think I'm an enemy."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., t882hcc91@y... wrote:
> Magmatron:
> 
>      "Um...good," Magmatron said to Apocalypse. "Get working on that 
> right away Guiledart."
>      He turned to Shredder, "If you don't mind, you could always use 
> the comm systems."
>      He turned back to Apocalypse, "Put cold oil on where ever it 
> helps." He said, commenting on the "exciting business."
